title: How do I obtain the latest official Huawei software update packages?
answer: When there are updates for your system, your phone will automatically prompt you to update. You can use a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection to download the update to your phone directly. Before updating, please ensure that your phone has sufficient storage space for the updates. You can also visit the [[Huawei Downloads Page]()](http://consumer.huawei.com/en/support/downloads/index.htm%22 \o %22 ) and download the latest software update package to update your phone.
keywords: ROM, software, upgrade package, firmware, flash, version
